snippet.title: Royal Duality Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The guardian of stories has been waiting for you.... He will guide you through an epic tale in a fantasy realm of mystery and magic, where wizards, vampires and fae clash in a tale with epic consequences.

Now, without any further ado....let the reading begin.

Royal Duality will be a free dark visual novel where your choices will dramatically impact the tale... it's coming soon to Itch.Io and Steam!

Visit our website:
https://royalduality2.wixsite.com/discover
Follow game updates on Twitter: https://twitter.com/royal_duality
